page.title: 06Fire,Police and Ambulance
page.content: November 5th would not be the same in Presteigne if the manned fire engine didn't lead the torch light procession through town to the local football club ground for the annual town{bonfire and fireworks display. The town also has two{full time {policemen}who not only police Presteigne but also patrol a much wider area.They use a police van and a car.Also there is an{ambulance service,one ambulance and two drivers.This ambulance also covers a wide area.The nearest{cottage hospital is 7mls. away in Knighton but the larger hospitals are 24mls. away in Hereford. Written by Sioned Pugh,Fiona Robinson,Neil Morris,Paula Price,Rhys Jones and Matthew Stocker.
